level.text: The Commission may, in its discretion, waive any of the provisions of Chapter 43 of Title 15 in any proceeding after duly advising the parties of its intention to do so.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 11319 (October 31, 2008), incorporating by reference the text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 9740-9743 (September 12, 2008).
